projects.name: Matrimony App Development
summary: A feature-rich matrimony application with responsive UI, seamless animations, real-time chat, and advanced search filters for personalized matchmaking.

details.title: Overview
items: Created a matrimony app with a user-friendly interface and seamless experience across various devices. The app incorporates adaptive animations, robust state management, and secure user communication features.

details.title: Key Features
items: Responsive UI with adaptive animations for smooth navigation across devices
Provider-based architecture for efficient state management and performance
Interactive form fields with input validation for smoother user onboarding
Real-time chat with read receipts, availability indicators, and enhanced communication
Advanced search filters and personalized recommendations based on user preferences
OTP-based mobile number verification for secure user login and registration

details.title: Technical Achievements
items: Collaborated with backend developers to optimize data flow and integrate REST APIs
Designed reusable widgets like custom text fields, gradient buttons, and animated indicators
Enhanced user engagement with smooth chat and communication features

features.title: Real-time Chat
features.description: Secure and intuitive chat functionality with real-time messaging, read receipts, and user availability indicators.

features.title: Advanced Search & Recommendations
features.description: Filters and recommendations based on user preferences, enhancing the matchmaking process.

features.title: Seamless UI/UX
features.description: A responsive and adaptive UI with smooth animations, providing a seamless experience across devices.

features.title: Enhanced Security
features.description: OTP-based mobile verification system for secure account creation and login.

projects.name: Koala Pet E-commerce App

items: Designed and developed an e-commerce application for the pet industry, integrating social logins and geolocation features to improve user experience and streamline shopping.

details.title: Core Features

Geolocation services for locating nearby stores and tracking delivery
Real-time delivery tracking integrated with Google Maps API

features.title: Social Logins

features.title: Geolocation Services

features.title: Real-time Market Data
